# stopBrowsingForNearbyPlayers()

**Instance Method**

Stops finding nearby players.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopBrowsingForNearbyPlayers()
```

## Discussion

If you use the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchmaker/startBrowsingForNearbyPlayers(handler:)] method to find nearby players, call this method when you are done.

## Looking for nearby players

- **startBrowsingForNearbyPlayers(handler:)**: Finds nearby players through Bluetooth or WiFi on the same subnet.
